text: Hi, I have a template and then my header and footer are in html. Is there a way I can use my theme header and footer in my template?

Hey Emily, I would suggest looking at the documentation for `{% include %}`  <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/cms/hubl#including-files-in-files>

This may help accomplish what you are looking to do.
where do I place the include in my template?

Hi everyone, are there some good tools, plugins, modules and scripts that automatically detect and preload critical css as well as defer non-critical? Wordpress has something similiar called W3 Total Cache, which is interesting.

I've done some research and found the closest thing to automation is using something like js.polyfill to call onload events for unsupported browsers. But even that is the tip of the iceberg it seems. <https://github.com/exiguus/js.polyfill.preload.onload>

any insight is much appreciated!
